name: Leningrib
description:
Warning! The game is available only in the Russian language.

You are a guy who's name is Lenin. You wanna have some new experience, that's why you arrive at this forest full of magic mushrooms.

- Grab and eat as many mushrooms as you can, and do not let foresters to catch you! 
- You can throw a bottle of Vodka to foresters, and they will forget about you for some time.
- Let mushrooms tell you what to do!

Initially, this game was designed for mobile platforms. But after successfully uploading a few alpha-builds, I received a message, that project 'was suspended and removed due to the policy issues'. ha-ha. And now it's here, adapted a bit for desktop, mouse&keyboard and.
